trans-unit.source: Using the preview3 folder and sub-folders
trans-unit.target: 使用 preview3 文件夹和子文件夹

trans-unit.source: This folder is the top-level node that matches the tools folder, but contains deltas for the .NET Core tooling Preview 3 release.
trans-unit.target: 此文件夹是匹配“工具”文件夹的顶层节点，但包含 .NET Core 工具预览版 3 发布的增量。

trans-unit.source: The goal of this separate parallel folder structure is to provide a location for the Preview 3 release related content that can be relatively easily merged into the main structure when provide version switching in the published site.
trans-unit.target: 此单独的并行文件夹结构的目的是提供预览版 3 发布相关内容的位置，当在发布站点中提供版本切换时，可以相对容易地将这些内容合并到主结构中。

trans-unit.source: The content under this node should be a smaller document set that represents the deltas from the Long Term Support (LTS) release and the latest current release.
trans-unit.target: 此节点下的内容应为较小的文档集，表示来自长期支持 (LTS) 发布和最新发布的增量。

trans-unit.source: Structure
trans-unit.target: 结构

trans-unit.source: There are two cases to adding new content for this release:
trans-unit.target: 有两种情况可以为此发布增添新内容：

trans-unit.source: Changes to existing documents
trans-unit.target: 对现有文档的更改

trans-unit.source: Copy the existing content into a parallel folder under this structure.
trans-unit.target: 将现有内容复制到此结构下的并行文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: Make your changes, and add the modified file to the TOC for the Preview 3 release.
trans-unit.target: 进行更改，并将修改后的文件添加到预览版 3 发布的 TOC。

trans-unit.source: New documents
trans-unit.target: 新建文档

trans-unit.source: Put the new document in the proper location, and add it to the TOC under the node for the Preview 3 release.
trans-unit.target: 将新文档放在正确的位置，并将其添加到预览版 3 发布的节点下的 TOC。

trans-unit.source: All current release files should have the following added near the top of the topic:
trans-unit.target: 所有当前发布的文件应在主题顶部附近添加以下内容：

trans-unit.source: We've created a snippet to include with the following syntax:
trans-unit.target: 我们创建了一个包含以下语法的代码段：

trans-unit.source: Link instructions
trans-unit.target: 链接说明

trans-unit.source: In both cases, provide links from current release to the LTS page (or parent index.md) for navigational purposes.
trans-unit.target: 在这两种情况下，提供从当前发布到 LTS 页（或父级 index.md）的链接以作导航。

trans-unit.source: Consider providing links from the LTS page (or parent index.md) to the new current release content page.
trans-unit.target: 考虑提供从 LTS 页（或父级 index.md）到新的当前发布内容页面的链接。

trans-unit.source: Future Considerations
trans-unit.target: 未来的注意事项

trans-unit.source: Our end goal is to surface different releases as branches in the [docs repo](https://github.com/dotnet/docs).
trans-unit.target: 最终目标是将不同的发布作为[文档存储库](https://github.com/dotnet/docs)中的分支进行展现。

trans-unit.source: Until that publishing scenario is supported, we'll use different top-level folders for each current release.
trans-unit.target: 在支持发布方案之前，我们将对每个当前发布使用不同的顶层文件夹。

trans-unit.source: When the time comes, we can merge each current release into the main [docs](../docs) folder, merge the TOC nodes, and publish as a separate doc set.
trans-unit.target: 到时，我们可将每个当前发布合并到主 [docs](../docs) 文件夹中，合并 TOC 节点，并作为单独的文档集发布。

trans-unit.source: We may need to merge modifications to both the LTS version of a file and the current release of a file, but we should be able to find those changes relatively easily.
trans-unit.target: 可能需要将修改合并到 LTS 版本的文件和当前发布的文件中，但我们应该能够相对容易地找到这些更改。
